messages.msgSnippet: HI I used to belong to the Token society of GB and I once saw Mishima san do kantei on several swords. this man is a genius. If you get chance to meet him I
messages.messageBody:
HI

I used to belong to the Token society of GB and I once
saw Mishima san do kantei on several swords. this man
is a genius.

If you get chance to meet him I highly recommend you
do

paul

Now playing on another channel...
